entry.title: Block Size Increase Requirements
entry.summary: In an email exchange on May 31, 2015, Jorge Tim√≥n posed a thought experiment to Gavin Andresen: what if all the block reward for miners came from fees rather than subsidies? Andresen responded by writing a blog post titled "When the Block Reward Goes Away" where he discussed the long-term hypothetical and why he believes it is a mistake to worry about it. The post can be found at http://gavinandresen.ninja/when-the-block-reward-goes-away.
